description: Basic service serializer mostly for returned values.

integration_id.description: The id of the Baserow integration we want the data for.

context_data.description: The context data of the service.

context_data_schema.description: The schema context data of the service.

table_id.description: The id of the Baserow table we want the data for.

view_id.description: The id of the Baserow view we want the data for.

filter_type.description:
Indicates whether all the rows should apply to all filters (AND) or to any filter (OR).

* `AND` - And
* `OR` - Or

search_query.description: Any search queries to apply to the service when it is dispatched.

row_id.description: A formula for defining the intended row.
